item.title: 印度卢比在亚洲货币反弹中失利，受印度央行关注
item.description: 印度卢比与整个新兴亚洲货币反弹的趋势背道而驰，央行进入市场阻止了任何涨势。【原文：India’s rupee is bucking the trend of rallying currencies across emerging Asia, with central bank forays into the market seen preventing any gains.】

item.title: 中国考虑允许地方政府发行债券购买住房
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在一系列救市方案未能支撑起市场之后，中国正在考虑为地方政府购买未售出房屋提供新的融资方案。【原文：China is considering a new funding option for local governments to buy unsold homes after a series of rescue packages failed to prop up the market, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚洲顶级货币与美元争夺战中需要关注的关键价位
item.description: 本月亚洲货币的反弹让人们看到了一些关键水平，因为交易员们正在等待美联储本周在杰克逊霍尔举行的年度会议，以巩固对美国今年降息的预期。【原文：The rally in Asian currencies this month is bringing some key levels into view as traders wait for the Federal Reserve’s annual confab in Jackson Hole this week to cement expectations for rate cuts in the US this year.】

item.title: 受全面改革计划影响，新西兰碳价跃升至 5 个月新高
item.description: 在政府宣布全面改革国家交易系统的计划之后，新西兰的碳价格飙升。【原文：New Zealand carbon prices surged after the government announced plans to overhaul the national trading system, which has been in limbo due to persistent oversupply.】

item.title: 华尔街策略师押注欧洲股市创新高
item.description: 八月金融市场的动荡让策略师们对欧洲股市的前景并不担心，预计今年欧洲股市将再创新高。【原文：The August turmoil in financial markets has left strategists unfazed about the outlook for European stocks, which are expected to scale new peaks this year.】

item.title: 瑞士钟表出口增长，美国和日本抵消了中国的大幅下降
item.description: 7 月份，瑞士钟表出口略有增长，原因是对美国和日本的出货量强劲，抵消了中国和香港对高档和奢侈钟表需求的进一步下降。【原文：Swiss watch exports eked out a slight gain in July as strong shipments to the US and Japan outweighed further declines in demand for premium and luxury timepieces in China and Hong Kong.】

item.title: 调查期限临近，瑞典 Alecta 公司业绩喜人
item.description: 瑞典 Alecta AB 公司报告称，受其股票投资组合 "强劲发展 "的推动，其旗舰固定缴费养老基金今年前六个月的回报率达到 7.7%。【原文：Sweden’s Alecta AB reported returns of 7.7% in its flagship defined contribution pension fund for the first six months of the year, buoyed by what it called “strong developments” across its share portfolio.】

item.title: 有报道称新光将被收购，台湾新光股价大涨
item.description: 当地媒体报道称，拥有保险、经纪和承保业务的台湾企业集团新光金控接近被一家更大的金融公司收购后，该公司股价周二大涨 6.3%。【原文：Shin Kong Financial Holding Co.’s shares jumped 6.3% on Tuesday after local media reported that the Taiwanese conglomerate, which has insurance, brokerage and underwriting businesses, was close to being acquired by a larger financial firm.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑测试 1.30 美元，股市将下跌
item.description: 2024年1月3日，星期三，一名上班族走过位于英国伦敦金融城的伦敦证券交易所集团中庭。1984年1月3日推出的富时100指数是20世纪80年代改变伦敦金融城的众多创新之一。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：An office worker walks through the London Stock Exchange Group Plc's atrium in the City of London, UK, on Wednesday, Jan. 3, 2024. item.description:

item.title: 孟加拉国大亨汗表示必须重振投资者信心
item.description: 孟加拉国最富有的大亨之一说，这个世界第二大服装出口国必须做出更多努力，创造高质量的就业机会，安抚紧张的投资者。【原文：One of Bangladesh’s wealthiest tycoons said the world’s second-largest garments exporter must do more to create quality jobs and assuage nervous investors.】

item.title: 诺斯伏告诉 Cuberg 员工重新申请研发部门的职位
item.description: 电池生产商 Northvolt AB 决定将研发工作从加利福尼亚州转移到瑞典园区后，已通知旧金山子公司的在职员工重新申请集团内的工作。【原文：Battery maker Northvolt AB has told current employees at a subsidiary in San Francisco to reapply for jobs within the group after a decision to shift its R&D efforts to a Swedish campus from California.】

item.title: 据说沙特基金有意为新货运航空公司引进波音和空客飞机
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的主权财富基金正在进行试探性谈判，为一家新的货运航空公司准备波音公司和空中客车公司的货机，因为该基金希望将沙特阿拉伯王国打造成一个物流枢纽，与迪拜和多哈相抗衡。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is in exploratory talks to line up Boeing Co. and Airbus SE freighters for a new cargo airline, as it looks to turn the kingdom into a logistics hub to rival Dubai and Doha.】

item.title: 中国从亚洲进口石油创历史新高 勿忘伊朗石油流向
item.description: 上个月，中国从马来西亚进口了创纪录的原油量，这表明在炼油商努力应对经济放缓导致的利润下降之际，他们对价格更低廉的伊朗石油的需求重新燃起。【原文：China imported a record volume of crude from Malaysia last month, pointing to a renewed appetite for cheaper Iranian oil as refiners grapple with lower margins due to an economic slowdown.】

item.description: 美国运通公司（American Express Co.【原文：American Express Co. is hunting for ways to make inroads in the last place on earth where cash is still king — the continent of Africa.】

item.title: 印度富人通过新枢纽进行海外投资的计划遭遇障碍
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度监管机构已停止允许当地家族办公室在其新金融中心设立投资基金，因为他们担心这些安排可能被用来逃避税收和资本管制。【原文：Indian regulators have stopped allowing local family offices to set up investment funds in its new finance hub, as they are concerned these arrangements may be used to evade taxes and capital controls, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国黄金进口再次下滑，创纪录的价格令买家望而却步
item.description: 由于创纪录的价格和持续的经济放缓抑制了全球最大金银购买国的需求，中国消费者上个月继续减少购买黄金。【原文：Chinese consumers continued to pull back on gold purchases last month, as record prices and a sustained economic slowdown curbed demand in the world’s biggest bullion-buying nation.】

item.title: 澳大利亚与印尼就被视为 "重要基石 "的防务条约达成一致
item.description: 澳大利亚总理安东尼.阿尔巴尼塞表示，他已与印尼就一项新的防务协定达成一致，两国都希望在争议日益激烈的亚太地区加强安全关系。【原文：Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said he’s agreed on a new defense pact with Indonesia as both nations aim to bolster security ties in an increasingly contested Asia-Pacific region.】

item.title: 反倾销调查可能提振印度钢铁企业股票
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 花旗称 "这次不同以往"，铁矿石将延续跌势
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）降低了铁矿石的价格预测，并表示市场动态已经发生变化，随着中国钢铁企业减产，铁矿石的跌幅有望扩大到每吨 80 美元。【原文：Iron ore is poised to extend declines into the $80s-a-ton range as China’s steelmakers reduce production, according to Citigroup Inc., which pared price forecasts and said that market dynamics have shifted.】

item.title: 2024 年最热门债券交易之一在关键收益率指标附近停滞不前
item.description: 印度 10 年期国债收益率在创下 2022 年以来的最低水平后跌势停滞。【原文：The drop in India’s 10-year bond yield is stalling after hitting its lowest level since 2022.】

item.title: 黄金创纪录突破 2500 美元，接下来会发生什么？
item.description: 在美联储准备下调美国利率的预期下，黄金价格突破每盎司 2,500 美元，创下历史新高。【原文：Gold is in record-setting form, topping $2,500 an ounce on expectations that the Federal Reserve is poised to cut US interest rates.】

item.title: Seven & I 收购将成为日本收购的分水岭
item.description: Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. 提议收购 Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.’s proposed acquisition of Seven & i Holdings Co., if successful, wouldn’t just be the largest takeover of a Japanese company, it would also be extremely rare.】

item.title: Kaisa 与债权人集团签订重组支持协议
item.description: 凯撒集团控股有限公司（Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd.）与一个重要的债权人团体达成了重组支持协议，这一举措可能有助于这家中国开发商抵御正在进行的清算申请。【原文：Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd. struck a restructuring support agreement with a key creditor group, a step that may help the Chinese developer defend itself against an ongoing liquidation petition.】

item.title: 中国人民银行发出谨慎信号后，中国银行维持主要贷款利率不变
item.description: 由于利润率面临压力，且政策制定者关注金融机构的健康状况，中国各银行维持 8 月份基准贷款利率不变。【原文：Chinese banks kept their benchmark lending rates unchanged for August, as profit margins come under pressure and policymakers focus on the health of financial institutions.】

item.title: 海外基金因美联储鸽派押注而重返印尼债券市场
item.description: 在美联储即将降息之际，海外投资者纷纷涌入印尼盾债券市场，印尼债券市场的资金外流将在今年得以消除。【原文：Indonesia’s bond market is set to erase its outflows for the year as overseas investors pile into rupiah debt amid imminent interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 鲍威尔杰克逊霍尔演讲前黄金稳定在 2,500 美元上方
item.description: 本周晚些时候，美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）将发表备受瞩目的讲话，他的讲话可能会为央行以多快的速度降息提供线索，在此之前，黄金在纪录高点附近持稳。【原文：Gold was steady near a record high before a hotly anticipated speech by Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell later in the week, which may offer clues on how rapidly the central bank will cut interest rates.】

item.title: 中国放松限购引发新房价格快速下跌
item.description: 随着地方政府减少干预，开发商竞相回笼资金，一场价格战正在中国新房市场蔓延。【原文：A price war is spreading across China’s new-home market, as local governments dial back on intervention and developers race to recoup cash.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长雷恩称增长风险增强 9 月减息理由
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）表示，欧洲经济增长前景面临的风险不断增加，这加强了欧洲央行在下月召开会议时进行政策调整的理由。【原文：Increasing risks to Europe’s growth outlook have reinforced the case for a policy adjustment when the European Central Bank meets next month, according to Governing Council member Olli Rehn.】
